# partyCode

**Instance Property**

If the game supports party code, this is the party code that can be shared among players to join the party.

## Declaration

```swift
var partyCode: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

If the game doesn’t support party code, this value will be `nil`. Use [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKGameActivity/start(definition:partyCode:)] to create a game activity with a custom party code.

## Getting and verifying the party code

- **partyURL**: If the game supports party code, this is the URL that can be shared among players to join the party.
- **validPartyCodeAlphabet**: Allowed characters for the party code to be used to share this activity.
- **isValidPartyCode(_:)**: Checks whether a party code is in valid format.
